ResearchProjectDef.label: Devil's Dust production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to extract Devil's Dust, a very dangerous and rage inducing battle drug, from Devilstrand.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mechanites workstation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to build mechanites, microscopic machines that can be programmed to have a wide variety of effects.

ResearchProjectDef.label: glitterworld medicine production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to fabricate glitterworld medicine. Extremely effective medical supplies that allow for successful surgeries under the most disadvantageous circumstances.

ResearchProjectDef.label: luciferium production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to tame the unpredictable Devil's Dust with the help of other subtances, to create the slightly less potent but much more reliable Luciferium.

ResearchProjectDef.label: flat screen television
ResearchProjectDef.description: learn to build a flatscreen television.

ResearchProjectDef.label: flat screen television
ResearchProjectDef.description: learn to build a megascreen television.
